name: Heppopatosus BETA
description:
This is the BETA version of this game. Soon there will be a full release and a release for Linux. This game was made with RPG Maker MV.

You are a warrior of Mtn. Dew and you need to save the meme crystals from a mysterious man. But who is the mysterious man?

This is the very first game I made and I hope you all enjoy it! :)

                                                                                         - The Creator <3
